bib_record.title: The measurement of the resonance integrals for neutron absorption.

free_txt: Flux of thermal neutrons at the center of the active
Cadmium ratio for gold foil of 0.05 g/cm2 thickness
was 3.18 . Cd pipe of 0.5 mm thickness was used as
neutron filter to remove neutrons < 0.49 eV.
This Li resonance integral was calculated using
